name: myDiaryApp
description: MyDiary is an online journal where users can pen down their thoughts and feelings.

scripts.dev-server-client: concurrently 'npm run dev' 'cd .. && cd client && npm start'
scripts.install-packages: cd server && npm install && cd .. && cd client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build-app && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-app
scripts.coveralls: nyc npm run test-server && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.test-client: cd .. && cd client && npm test && cd ..
scripts.ui-test-coverage: cd .. && cd client && npm run test-coverage && cd ..
scripts.build-client: cd .. && cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build-client && npm run build
scripts.pretest-server: NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate:undo && NODE_ENV=test npm run migrate && NODE_ENV=test npm run seed
